name: The Rising Sun
description:
The Rising Sun is all about fighting the control the internet and certain platforms can have on your life. 

You play as a hero addicted to the internet, they seclude themselves inside their own home while days and nights pass. They realise that they cannot go on living the way they do. You (the hero) then go on to fight and overcome the addictive hold of the internet.

This is a game meant to help motivate people to improve their consumption online and lead a better life. It is a university project meant to reflect an experience from my own life. The game is smaller than I would have liked it to be due to time constraints (possible expansions in the future).
